page.title: 05GAMES CHILDREN PLAY IN B.N.
page.content: SNOW,RAIN,THUNDER,LIGHTNING. One person stands in front and says,"Snow, Rain, Thunder, Lightning". They all do handstands and the person staying up the longest stands in front. FRENCH CRICKET. Use a tennis ball and bat. Any fielder may hit the batsman below the knee or catch him out. CATCH. One person is the catcher who chases the others.Anyone caught becomes the catcher. SKIPPING. Have a rope long enough to jump over. Hold each end and skip over the rope.BRITISH BULLDOG. One person calls a name and that person tries to reach the other side without being caught.If he succeeds all the children follow.If he fails he joins the caller.KISS CATCH. The boys try to catch the girls and kiss them. Then the girls chase the boys.HIDE AND SEEK. One person counts to 50 while others hide. Then the search begins.
